extendedInfo.description: â The TOP 5 HOTTEST SOCIAL APP IN THE PLAY STORE  âPersonalize your messages to your loved ones with your own handwriting font! Turn Your Handwriting into a FONT in 5 minutes. Simply draw each letter with your finger, and instantly get your TTF font by email. Make your very own cutest and most unique handwritten fonts now! Also caption your photos in your own handwriting, and share your life, uniquely, on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and Google+, right from your phone. âââââ Built by Google Award winning developers and Stanford engineers, InstaFontMaker is the #1 Font Maker in the Play Store. It is fast, fun, and simple. âââââ Selected as Ericsson's Top 7 App for CIty Life, InstaFontMaker (previously Font.My) is the new way to express yourself.*** Please note that this is NOT a font installer for phones (e.g. not a FlipFont.)  The font installer feature will be released in August 2013!***Features:â¨â Create your 100% original hand font in 5 minutes. â Undo, redo, set font thickness, and adjust letter spacing.â Generate and email to you a TTF font, which is the most common format for fonts on both Mac OS and Windows applications (e.g. MS Word, Photoshop). It can also be used on websites as a web font, in digital scrapbooks, and in craft projects. It's the mini iFontMaker for Android. â Use your fonts right away with the built-in "Compose/ Write" tool, which lets you:             - Add your very own handwritten fonts to your photos.â Sharing options : â Facebook â Twitter âInstagram â Google+ â email â Line â SMS â Pinterest and more.âââ See snapshots below for sample fonts made by our real users. âââââââ Currently, InstaFont supports characters in:â Czechâ Danishâ Dutchâ Finnishâ Frenchâ Germanâ Hungarianâ Icelandicâ Italianâ Maoriâ Norwegianâ Polishâ Portugueseâ Romanianâ Russianâ Spanishâ Swedishâ Thaiâ Turkishâ Welshâ To add characters, click + at the bottom toolbar --> Set Font Info --> check the set of characters and additional languages --> click OK.Create your own fonts today.Personalize your pictures with your very own handwriting, and give life to your messages.Â¹Quick how-to: After you're done, press the Finish button in the top right corner which generates the font. You can then press email to send yourself the TTF font.

reviews.title: Soooo cooool!
reviews.comment: This app is so cool, please update so that i can download my own fonts thank you :)
reviews.author: Saereem Ahn

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This supports Spanish inputs and special characters. It makes it super easy to cuatomize your phone fonts.  I\'d give it 5 stars if it was optimized for my pen on galaxy note 2 so the strokes are more fluent and nicer!
reviews.author: Luis Guillermo Vindas Rojas

reviews.title: Can\'t open
reviews.comment: Would be very good if I could get it to work. After download say \"cannot open file\". S3 mini

reviews.title: 3 stars for the potential
reviews.comment: Tried to send message as sms, but it is packaged as an mms, which costs more to send.  Also, doesn\'t look very good as mms.  Disappointed, but hopefully I\'ll be able to up the stars with the promised development.

reviews.title: Perfect!

reviews.title: Font downloading
reviews.comment: If only the fonts could be downloaded into the phone, that would be best.
reviews.author: Andrea Chan

reviews.title: This app made my day
reviews.comment: What an awesome idea it is so fabbbb :-)   Stuff you should add to editor (as advanced mode): - calligraphy brush, custom angle - eraser with custom brush shape/angle - different brush sizes in one character - use photo/cam for importing character - basic shapes (cirle,block,star,heart) - snap to grid mode for making pixel style fonts - add custom shapes to insert in characters throughout font - vector brush editor  I\'m sure people would pay for advanced features too :-)  I know I would...
reviews.author: Victoria Veritas

reviews.title: GREAT
reviews.comment: I love this app. Its very creative and fun. Just cant wait till August so I can install it on my phone.... ;)

reviews.comment: Awesome app. Love it.
